document_data.name: Bonehoof
document_data.mainbody: '''Bonehoof''' was an [[undead]] [[skeleton]] [[minotaur]] in [[Myth Drannor]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.History: The creature remained locked inside [[Tyrintar's Hall]], along with countless other undead. It was encountered when [[Uhlsdrin Nirveth]] came looking for the [[Icon of the Dwarves]] in [[1374 DR]].
